title: Pea soup with jamón Ibérico
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons Spanish extra virgin olive oil', '2 slices rustic bread', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 Spanish onion, finely chopped', '50g jamón Ibérico, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon sweet pimenton', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 tablespoon Sherry vinegar', '600ml chicken stock', '1 bay leaf', '500g frozen green peas', 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste']
